OnchainSubscriptionsHero.title: Sell Confidently
OnchainSubscriptionsHero.subtitle:
Assign roles and identities to 3rd parties like manufacturers, distributors and
co-sellers to seamlessly track commissions and settlements
that eliminate fraud and clickjacking

OnchainSubscriptionsFeatures.headingSubtitle:
Leverage onchain attribution to protect partner relationships. Guarantee accurate
commissions while eliminating fraud typically associated with bad actors.

tamperProofSales.title: Tamper-Proof Sales
tamperProofSales.description: Customers cannot bypass approved co-seller referrals when making purchases in order to protect commission integrity

automatedTracking.title: Automated Tracking
automatedTracking.description: Easily track affiliate sales and SaaS subscription referrals that ensure accurate, automated commission payouts between parties

seamlessIntegration.title: Seamless Integration
seamlessIntegration.description: Use the technology without additional coding or technical skills needed to further simplify partnership tracking between distributors and co-sellers

protectedCommissions.title: Protected Commissions
protectedCommissions.description: Partners and co-sellers earn their fair share with secure affiliate tracking that prevents any loss of commissions for their verified work

affiliateMadeEasy.title: Affiliate Made Easy
affiliateMadeEasy.description: Integrate inventory and a rewards system with various SaaS platforms and services to expand earning potential across networks

realTimeAnalytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
realTimeAnalytics.description: Monitor subscription referrals and performance metrics in real time to maintain and keep complete control of the affiliate side of the business

secureAffiliateTracking.title: Secure Affiliate Tracking
secureAffiliateTracking.description: Ensure commissions are safely attributed onchain thanks to advanced tracking technology

automatedCommissionPayouts.title: Automated Commission Payouts and Distributions
automatedCommissionPayouts.description: Receive automated, accurate payouts that make activating and running affiliate management effortless

expandRevenueStreams.title: Expand Revenue Streams
expandRevenueStreams.description: Expand reach through multiple networks and partners to grow income on both physical inventory, digital goods and subscription services
